doc.title: 'Imush Q'uyatl'un
doc.plot: A nudibranch (sea snail) dances to the drum beat and rhythm of an aboriginal, Coast Salish Song. It bears an environmental message passed on for thousands of years: If we are to save our environment, appreciate our coastal, marine ecosystems, we must pay attention and bear witness to every tiny aspect of what lies before us.

A nudibranch (sea snail) dances to the drum beat and rhythm of an aboriginal, Coast Salish Song. It bears an environmental message passed on for thousands of years: If we are to save our environment, appreciate our coastal, marine ecosystems, we must pay attention and bear witness to every tiny aspect of what lies before us.
